AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States Sentencing Commission: issuer of the Guidelines Manual that applies to Rogelio Valero-De La Rosa's case
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Rogelio Valero-De La Rosa: defendant who waived the right to appeal the sentence imposed and the manner in which it was determined, argued disparity in sentencing due to counsel's failure
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Plea Agreement: agreement between Rogelio Valero-De La Rosa and the government, including waiver of certain rights
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Plea Agreement Addendum: document signed by Rogelio Valero-De La Rosa, confirming understanding of rights and provisions of the United States Sentencing Commission's Guidelines Manual
